history.content: 请参加课堂讨论的同学在这里回复要求你回答的问题。
history.subject: 第22讲实验八的课堂练习回答

children.subject:
滕爽 2012011270

void vfs_init(void);
void vfs_cleanup(void);
void vfs_devlist_init(void);
int vfs_set_curdir(struct inode *dir);
int vfs_get_curdir(struct inode **dir_store);
int vfs_get_root(const char *devname, struct inode **root_store);
const char *vfs_get_devname(struct fs *fs);
int vfs_open(char *path, uint32_t open_flags, struct inode **inode_store);
int vfs_close(struct inode *node);
int vfs_link(char *old_path, char *new_path);
int vfs_symlink(char *old_path, char *new_path);
int vfs_readlink(char *path, struct iobuf *iob);
int vfs_mkdir(char *path);
int vfs_unlink(char *path);
int vfs_rename(char *old_path, char *new_path);
int vfs_chdir(char *path);
int vfs_getcwd(struct iobuf *iob);
int vfs_lookup(char *path, struct inode **node_store);
int vfs_lookup_parent(char *path, struct inode **node_store, char **endp);
int vfs_set_bootfs(char *fsname);
int vfs_get_bootfs(struct inode **node_store);

int vfs_add_fs(const char *devname, struct fs *fs);
int vfs_add_dev(const char *devname, struct inode *devnode, bool mountable);

int vfs_mount(const char *devname, int (*mountfunc)(struct device *dev, struct fs **fs_store));
int vfs_unmount(const char *devname);
int vfs_unmount_all(void);

1. 文件支持的操作：创建文件，打开文件，关闭文件，读取文件，写入文件，获取文件类型(gettype)，尝试移动文件指针(tryseek)，强制写回脏数据(fsync)，截断文件(truncate)等。

μcore文件操作主要函数调用流程（以用户态程序读文件为例）：

用户态

sysread(int, void*, size_t);

syscall(int, int, void*, size_t);

内核态

__alltraps

trap(struct trapframe*);

trap_dispatch(struct trapframe*);

syscall();

sys_read(uint32_t[]);

sysfile_read(int, void*, size_t);

file_read(int, void*, size_t, size)t);

vop_read(struct inode*, struct iobuf*);

sfs_read(struct inode*, struct iobuf*);

sfs_io(struct inode*, struct iobuf*, bool);

sfs_io_nolock(struct sfs_fs*, struct sfs_inode*, void*, off_t, size_t, bool);

sfs_rblock(struct sfs_fs*, void*, uint32_t, uint32_t);

sfs_rwblock(struct sfs_fs*, void*, uint32_t, uint32_t, bool);

sfs_rwblock_nolock(struct sfs_fs*, void*, uint32_t, bool, bool);

disk0_io(struct device*, struct iobuf*, bool);

disk0_read_blks_nolock(uint32_t, uint32_t);

ide_read_secs(unsigned short, uint32_t, void*, size_t);

(inline assembly)

董欣 计25 2012011361
int sys_open(const char *path, uint32_t open_flags);
int sys_close(int fd);
int sys_read(int fd, void *base, size_t len);
int sys_write(int fd, void *base, size_t len);
int sys_seek(int fd, off_t pos, int whence);
int sys_fstat(int fd, struct stat *stat);
int sys_fsync(int fd);
int sys_getcwd(char *buffer, size_t len);
int sys_getdirentry(int fd, struct dirent *dirent);
int sys_dup(int fd1, int fd2);

如果从磁盘读取文件的话，是如下过程：

This is func sysfile_read in kern/sysfile.c!
This is func file_read in kern/fs/file.c!
This is func vop_read in func file_read!
This is func sfs_read in kern/fs/sfs/sfs_inode.c!
This is func sfs_io in kern/fs/sfs/sfs_inode.c!
This is func sfs_io_nolock in kern/fs/sfs/sfs_inode.c!
This is func sfs_rwblock_nolock in kern/fs/sfs/sfs_io.c!
This is func disk0_io in kern/fs/devs/dev_disk0.c!
This is func disk0_read_blks_nolock in kern/fs/devs/dev_disk0.c

如果从stdin设备文件即键盘读取，是：

This is func read in user/libs/file.c!
This is func sys_read in kern/syscall.c!
This is func sysfile_read in kern/sysfile.c!
This is func file_read in kern/fs/file.c!
This is func vop_read in func file_read!
This is func dev_read in kern/fs/devs/dev.c!
This is func stdin_io in kern/fs/devs/dev_stdin.c!
This is func dev_stdin_read in kern/fs/devs/dev_stdin.c!

unsigned long vop_magic;
    int (*vop_open)(struct inode *node, uint32_t open_flags);
    int (*vop_close)(struct inode *node);
    int (*vop_read)(struct inode *node, struct iobuf *iob);
    int (*vop_write)(struct inode *node, struct iobuf *iob);
    int (*vop_fstat)(struct inode *node, struct stat *stat);
    int (*vop_fsync)(struct inode *node);
    int (*vop_namefile)(struct inode *node, struct iobuf *iob);
    int (*vop_getdirentry)(struct inode *node, struct iobuf *iob);
    int (*vop_reclaim)(struct inode *node);
    int (*vop_gettype)(struct inode *node, uint32_t *type_store);
    int (*vop_tryseek)(struct inode *node, off_t pos);
    int (*vop_truncate)(struct inode *node, off_t len);
    int (*vop_create)(struct inode *node, const char *name, bool excl, struct inode **node_store);
    int (*vop_lookup)(struct inode *node, char *path, struct inode **node_store);
    int (*vop_ioctl)(struct inode *node, int op, void *data);

SFS对上提供的接口，有文件操作和目录操作

目录的操作：
sfs_opendir(struct inode *node, uint32_t open_flags)
sfs_close(struct inode *node)
sfs_fstat(struct inode *node, struct stat *stat)
sfs_fsync(struct inode *node)
sfs_namefile(struct inode *node, struct iobuf *iob)
sfs_getdirentry(struct inode *node, struct iobuf *iob)
sfs_reclaim(struct inode *node)
sfs_gettype(struct inode *node, uint32_t *type_store)
sfs_lookup(struct inode *node, char *path, struct inode **node_store)

文件操作
sfs_openfile(struct inode *node, uint32_t open_flags)
sfs_close(struct inode *node)
sfs_read(struct inode *node, struct iobuf *iob)
sfs_write(struct inode *node, struct iobuf *iob)
sfs_fstat(struct inode *node, struct stat *stat)
sfs_fsync(struct inode *node)
sfs_reclaim(struct inode *node)
sfs_gettype(struct inode *node, uint32_t *type_store)
sfs_tryseek(struct inode *node, off_t pos)
sfs_truncfile(struct inode *node, off_t len)

其中有一些重复，因为目录也是一种文件，所以close等操作是相同的

目录相关操作：

目录可以有两种表示方式：

char*的纯字符目录名

或者dirent结构（位于libs/dirent.h），包括char*形式的路径名，以及offset

在sysfile.c中有：

int sysfile_chdir(const char *__path)

int sysfile_getcwd(char *buf, size_t len)

int sysfile_getdirentry(int fd, struct dirent *__direntp)

等操作，是与目录相关的操作

其中调用的底层目录操作函数在vfspath.c

int vfs_chdir(char *path)

int vfs_getcwd(struct iobuf *iob)

int vfs_set_curdir(struct inode *dir)

int vfs_get_curdir(struct inode **dir_store)

int file_getdirentry(int fd, struct dirent *direntp)

更底层的调用在vfslookup.c

int vfs_lookup(char *path, struct inode **node_store)

是通过文件名path，寻找对应inode的函数

最底层的是一些vop操作，位于inode.h的inode_ops结构体中

int (*vop_lookup)(struct inode *node, char *path, struct inode **node_store);

在dev.c中被绑定到dev_lookup等设备相关的函数

计13 张宏辉 2011011237

问题：文件系统中安装点支持哪些什么操作？

int vfs_mount(const char *devname, int (*mountfunc)(struct device *dev, struct fs **fs_store));

int vfs_unmount(const char *devname);

int vfs_unmount_all(void);
